title: RBAC validation
parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const rbacStep = stepResults.check_rbac_grants; if (rbacStep.error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'No response received from API', code: 'NO_RESPONSE', test_id: 'IQ-102-3', title: 'RBAC validation' }; } const apiOutput = rbacStep.data; if (apiOutput.status && apiOutput.status.state === 'SUCCEEDED') { const dataArray = apiOutput.result && apiOutput.result.data_array ? apiOutput.result.data_array : []; const approvedRoles = ['analyst']; const foundApprovedUsers = new Set(); for (const row of dataArray) { if (row && row.length > 0) { const principal = String(row[0]).toLowerCase(); if (approvedRoles.map(role => role.toLowerCase()).includes(principal)) { foundApprovedUsers.add(principal); } } } if (foundApprovedUsers.size > 0) { return { status: 'pass', message: 'RBAC properly implemented with approved roles: ' + Array.from(foundApprovedUsers).join(', '), code: 'RBAC_VERIFIED', test_id: 'IQ-102-3', title: 'RBAC validation' }; } else { return { status: 'fail', message: 'No approved roles found with access to the schema', code: 'MISSING_APPROVED_ROLES', test_id: 'IQ-102-3', title: 'RBAC validation' }; } } else { const errorMessage = apiOutput.status && apiOutput.status.error ? apiOutput.status.error : 'Unknown error'; return { status: 'fail', message: 'Failed to execute RBAC validation query: ' + errorMessage, code: 'QUERY_EXECUTION_FAILED', test_id: 'IQ-102-3', title: 'RBAC validation' }; } }
